  item_sends_or_receives s m
‚Üí selected_message_exists_in_some_preloaded_traces
    vlsm item_sends_or_receives s m
 by apply consistency_from_valid_state_proj2.
Qed.

End sent_received_observed_capabilities.

Definition computable_messages_oracle
  `(vlsm : VLSM message)
  (oracle_set : vstate vlsm -> set message)
  (message_selector : message -> transition_item -> Prop) : Prop :=
    oracle_stepwise_props message_selector (fun s m => m ‚àà oracle_set s).

Class ComputableSentMessages `(vlsm : VLSM message) :=
{
  sent_messages_set : vstate vlsm -> list message;
  csm_computable_oracle :
    computable_messages_oracle vlsm sent_messages_set (field_selector output);
}.

Global Hint Mode ComputableSentMessages - ! : typeclass_instances.

Class ComputableReceivedMessages `(vlsm : VLSM message) :=
{
  received_messages_set : vstate vlsm -> list message;
  crm_computable_oracle :
    computable_messages_oracle vlsm received_messages_set (field_selector input);
}.

Global Hint Mode ComputableReceivedMessages - ! : typeclass_instances.

Properties of Computable Message Oracles

In this section we prove several generic results about computable_messages_oracles, derive HasBeenSentCapability and HasBeenReceivedCapability from ComputableSentMessages and ComputableReceivedMessages and some basic results about computable (directly) observed messages. 
Section sec_computable_sent_received_observed.

Context
  `(vlsm : VLSM message).


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
oracle_set: vstate vlsm ‚Üí set message
message_selector: message ‚Üí transition_item ‚Üí Prop
Hrm: computable_messages_oracle vlsm oracle_set
  message_selector
s: vstate vlsm
Hs: vinitial_state_prop vlsm s
oracle_set s = []


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
oracle_set: vstate vlsm ‚Üí set message
message_selector: message ‚Üí transition_item ‚Üí Prop
Hrm: computable_messages_oracle vlsm oracle_set
  message_selector
s: vstate vlsm
Hs: vinitial_state_prop vlsm s
oracle_set s = []

  
message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
oracle_set: vstate vlsm ‚Üí set message
message_selector: message ‚Üí transition_item ‚Üí Prop
Hrm: computable_messages_oracle vlsm oracle_set
  message_selector
s: vstate vlsm
Hs: vinitial_state_prop vlsm s
x: message
x ‚àâ oracle_set s

  by eapply oracle_no_inits in Hs; [| apply Hrm]; cbn in Hs.
Qed.

Definition computable_messages_oracle_rel
  `(Hrm : computable_messages_oracle vlsm oracle_set message_selector)
  (s : vstate vlsm)
  (m : message)
  : Prop :=
  m ‚àà oracle_set s.

Definition computable_messages_oracle_rel_dec
  `(Hrm : computable_messages_oracle vlsm oracle_set message_selector)
  `{EqDecision message}
  : RelDecision (computable_messages_oracle_rel Hrm) :=
  fun s m => decide_rel _ _ (oracle_set s).


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
s: vinitial_state vlsm
sent_messages_set (`s) = []


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
s: vinitial_state vlsm
sent_messages_set (`s) = []

  by eapply computable_messages_oracle_initial_state_empty;
    [apply csm_computable_oracle | destruct s].
Qed.

Definition ComputableSentMessages_has_been_sent
  `{!ComputableSentMessages vlsm}
  : vstate vlsm ‚Üí message ‚Üí Prop :=
  computable_messages_oracle_rel csm_computable_oracle.

#[export] Instance computable_sent_message_has_been_sent_dec
  `{!ComputableSentMessages vlsm}
  `{EqDecision message}
  : RelDecision ComputableSentMessages_has_been_sent :=
  computable_messages_oracle_rel_dec csm_computable_oracle.


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
HasBeenSentCapability vlsm


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
HasBeenSentCapability vlsm

  
message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
has_been_sent_stepwise_props ?has_been_sent_pred
message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
RelDecision ?has_been_sent_pred

  
message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
has_been_sent_stepwise_props ?has_been_sent_pred
 apply csm_computable_oracle.
  
message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
RelDecision
  (Œª (s : vstate vlsm) (m : message),
     m ‚àà sent_messages_set s)
 typeclasses eauto.
Defined.


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
‚àÄ (s : vstate vlsm) (m : message),
  m ‚àà sent_messages_set s ‚Üî has_been_sent vlsm s m


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
‚àÄ (s : vstate vlsm) (m : message),
  m ‚àà sent_messages_set s ‚Üî has_been_sent vlsm s m
 done. Qed.


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableReceivedMessages0: ComputableReceivedMessages
  vlsm
s: vinitial_state vlsm
received_messages_set (`s) = []


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message

  vlsm
s: vinitial_state vlsm
received_messages_set (`s) = []

  by eapply computable_messages_oracle_initial_state_empty;
    [apply crm_computable_oracle | destruct s].
Qed.

Definition ComputableReceivedMessages_has_been_sent
  `{!ComputableReceivedMessages vlsm}
  : vstate vlsm ‚Üí message ‚Üí Prop
  := computable_messages_oracle_rel crm_computable_oracle.

#[export] Instance computable_received_message_has_been_sent_dec
  `{!ComputableReceivedMessages vlsm}
  `{EqDecision message}
  : RelDecision ComputableReceivedMessages_has_been_sent :=
  computable_messages_oracle_rel_dec crm_computable_oracle.

vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableReceivedMessages0: ComputableReceivedMessages
  vlsm

  vlsm

has_been_received_stepwise_props
  ?has_been_received_pred

  vlsm

  ?has_been_received_pred

  vlsm

  (Œª (s : vstate vlsm) (m : message),
     m ‚àà received_messages_set s)
 typeclasses eauto.
Defined.

ComputableReceivedMessages0: ComputableReceivedMessages
  vlsm

‚àÄ (s : vstate vlsm) (m : message),
  m ‚àà received_messages_set s
  ‚Üî has_been_received vlsm s m


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
ComputableReceivedMessages0: ComputableReceivedMessages
  vlsm
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
‚àÄ (s : vstate vlsm) (m : message),
  m ‚àà received_messages_set s
  ‚Üî has_been_received vlsm s m
 done. Qed.

Computable (Directly) Observed Messages

We here derive directly_observed_messages_set from ComputableSentMessages and ComputableReceivedMessages and relate it to the has_been_directly_observed predicate. 
Section sec_computable_observed.

Context
  `{EqDecision message}
  `{!ComputableSentMessages vlsm}
  `{!ComputableReceivedMessages vlsm}
  .

Definition directly_observed_messages_set (s : vstate vlsm) : list message :=
  sent_messages_set s ++ received_messages_set s.


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
ComputableReceivedMessages0: ComputableReceivedMessages
  vlsm
‚àÄ s : vstate vlsm,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm vlsm) s
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ m : message,
      m ‚àà directly_observed_messages_set s
      ‚Üî has_been_directly_observed vlsm s m


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
ComputableReceivedMessages0: ComputableReceivedMessages
  vlsm
‚àÄ s : vstate vlsm,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm vlsm) s
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ m : message,
      m ‚àà directly_observed_messages_set s
      ‚Üî has_been_directly_observed vlsm s m

  by intros; split; setoid_rewrite elem_of_app;
    rewrite has_been_received_messages_set_iff, elem_of_sent_messages_set.
Qed.


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
ComputableReceivedMessages0: ComputableReceivedMessages
  vlsm
computable_messages_oracle vlsm
  directly_observed_messages_set
  item_sends_or_receives


message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
ComputableReceivedMessages0: ComputableReceivedMessages
  vlsm
computable_messages_oracle vlsm
  directly_observed_messages_set
  item_sends_or_receives

  
message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
ComputableReceivedMessages0: ComputableReceivedMessages
  vlsm
s: vstate vlsm
H: initial_state_prop s
m: message
m ‚àâ directly_observed_messages_set s
message: Type
vlsm: VLSM message
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
ComputableSentMessages0: ComputableSentMessages vlsm
ComputableReceivedMessages0: ComputableReceivedMessages
  vlsm
l: label
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
H: input_valid_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm vlsm) l
  (s, im) (s', om)
msg: message
msg ‚àà directly_observed_messages_set s'
‚Üî item_sends_or_receives msg
    {|
      l := l;
      input := im;
      destination := s';
      output := om
    |} ‚à® msg ‚àà directly_observed_messages_set s

ComputableReceivedMessages0: ComputableReceivedMessages
  vlsm
s: vstate vlsm
H: initial_state_prop s
m: message
m ‚àâ directly_observed_messages_set s

  vlsm
s: vstate vlsm
H: initial_state_prop s
m: message
¬¨ has_been_directly_observed vlsm s m

message: Type

  vlsm

 by eapply input_valid_transition_origin.
Qed.

End sec_computable_observed.

End sec_computable_sent_received_observed.


message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
s: state
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
m: message
Hsent: has_been_sent X s m
can_emit X m

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is s tr

message: Type

H: HasBeenSentCapability X

m: message
Hsent: has_been_sent X s m
finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is s tr

    clear -Htr; destruct X;
      by eapply VLSM_incl_finite_valid_trace_init_to;
        [apply vlsm_incl_pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm |].

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is s
  tr
item_z: transition_item
Hitem_z: item_z ‚àà tr
Hz: field_selector output m item_z
can_emit X m

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
s, is: state
item_z: transition_item
pre_z, suf_z: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to X is s
  (pre_z ++ item_z :: suf_z)
m: message

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is s
  (pre_z ++ item_z :: suf_z)
Hz: field_selector output m item_z
can_emit X m

X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
s, is: state
item_z: transition_item
pre_z, suf_z: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_from_to X is s
  (pre_z ++ item_z :: suf_z)
m: message
Hpre_tr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is s
  (pre_z ++ item_z :: suf_z)
Hz: field_selector output m item_z
can_emit X m

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
s, is: state
item_z: transition_item
pre_z, suf_z: list transition_item
m: message
Hpre_tr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is s
  (pre_z ++ item_z :: suf_z)
Hz: field_selector output m item_z
Htr: input_valid_transition X 
  (l item_z)
  (finite_trace_last is pre_z, input item_z)
  (destination item_z, output item_z)
can_emit X m

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
s, is: state
item_z: transition_item
pre_z, suf_z: list transition_item
m: message
Hpre_tr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is s
  (pre_z ++ item_z :: suf_z)
Hz: output item_z = Some m
Htr: input_valid_transition X 
  (l item_z)
  (finite_trace_last is pre_z, input item_z)
  (destination item_z, Some m)
can_emit X m

  by eexists _,_,_.
Qed.

message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
s: state
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
m: message
Hsent: has_been_sent X s m
Heq:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_is_pre_loaded_with_True
  X: VLSM_eq (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (pre_loaded_vlsm X (Œª _ : message, True))
can_emit (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) m

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
s: state
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
m: message
Hsent: has_been_sent X s m
Heq:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_is_pre_loaded_with_True
  X: VLSM_eq (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (pre_loaded_vlsm X (Œª _ : message, True))
can_emit
  {|
    vtype :=
      vtype (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X);
    vmachine :=
      machine
        (pre_loaded_vlsm X (Œª _ : message, True))
  |} m

  by cbn; eapply sent_can_emit; [apply (VLSM_eq_valid_state Heq) |].
Qed.


message: Type
X: VLSM message

valid_message_prop X m

Hs: valid_state_prop X s
m: message

valid_message_prop X m

  by apply emitted_messages_are_valid_iff; right; eapply sent_can_emit.
Qed.

IHHs: has_been_received X s m
‚Üí valid_message_prop X m

  (has_been_received X)

    apply has_been_received_stepwise_from_trace.

‚Üí valid_message_prop X m
Hom': option_valid_message_prop X om

  {|
    l := l;
    input := om;
    destination := s';
    output := om'
  |} ‚à® has_been_received X s m
valid_message_prop X m

    destruct Hreceived as [[= ->] |]; auto.
Qed.

message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s: state
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
m: message
H1: has_been_received X s m
valid_message_prop X m
 by eapply received_valid.
Qed.

Equivocation in compositions

We now move on to a composite context. Each component of our composition will have has_been_sent and has_been_received capabilities.
We introduce validators along with their respective weights, the A function which maps validators to indices of component VLSMs and the sender function which maps messages to their (unique) designated sender (if any).
For the equivocation fault sum to be computable, we also require that the number of validators and the number of machines in the composition are both finite. See finite_index, finite_validator. 
Section Composite.

Context
  {message : Type}
  `{finite.Finite index}
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  (Free := free_composite_vlsm IM)
  `{forall i : index, (HasBeenSentCapability (IM i))}
  `{forall i : index, (HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i))}
  .

Section StepwiseProps.

Context
  [message_selectors: forall i : index, message -> vtransition_item (IM i) -> Prop]
  [oracles: forall i, state_message_oracle (IM i)]
  (stepwise_props: forall i, oracle_stepwise_props (message_selectors i) (oracles i))
  .


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
message ‚Üí composite_transition_item IM ‚Üí Prop


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
message ‚Üí composite_transition_item IM ‚Üí Prop

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
msg: message
i: index
li: vlabel (IM i)
input: option message
s: state
output: option message
Prop

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
msg: message
i: index
li: vlabel (IM i)
input: option message
s: state
output: option message
vtransition_item (IM i)

  exact {|l:=li;input:=input;destination:=s i;output:=output|}.
Defined.

Definition composite_oracle : composite_state IM -> message -> Prop :=
  fun s msg => exists i, oracles i (s i) msg.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
oracle_stepwise_props composite_message_selector
  composite_oracle


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
oracle_stepwise_props composite_message_selector
  composite_oracle

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
‚àÄ s : vstate X,
  initial_state_prop s
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ m : message, ¬¨ composite_oracle s m
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (im : option message) 
  (s' : state) (om : option message),
  input_valid_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l 
    (s, im) (s', om)
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ msg : message,
      composite_oracle s' msg
      ‚Üî composite_message_selector msg
          {|
            l := l;
            input := im;
            destination := s';
            output := om
          |} ‚à® composite_oracle s msg

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)

  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop

    (message_selectors i)

constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
li: vlabel (IM i)
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
j: index
Hproto: s j = s' j
‚à® (‚àÉ li0 : vlabel (IM j),
     existT i li = existT j li0
     ‚àß input_valid_transition
         (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
            (IM j)) li0 
         (s j, im) (s' j, om))
msg: message
s j = s' j ‚à® j = i

      destruct Hproto as [|(lj & Hlj & _)]; [by left | right; congruence].

message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
li: vlabel (IM i)
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
msg: message
Hproto: oracles i (s' i) msg
‚Üî message_selectors i msg
    {|
      l := li;
      input := im;
      destination := s' i;
      output := om
    |} ‚à® oracles i (s i) msg
Hsj: ‚àÄ j : index, s j = s' j ‚à® j = i
j: index
Hj: oracles j (s' j) msg
message_selectors i msg
  {|
    l := li;
    input := im;
    destination := s' i;
    output := om
  |} ‚à® composite_oracle s msg

EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)

  {|
    l := li;
    input := im;
    destination := s' i;

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)

  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
li: vlabel (IM i)
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
msg: message
Hproto: oracles i (s' i) msg
‚Üî message_selectors i msg
    {|
      l := li;
      input := im;
      destination := s' i;
      output := om
    |} ‚à® oracles i (s i) msg
Hsj: ‚àÄ j : index, s j = s' j ‚à® j = i
j: index
Hbefore: oracles j (s j) msg
Hunchanged: s j = s' j
oracles j (s' j) msg
 by rewrite <- Hunchanged.
        
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
li: vlabel (IM i)
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
msg: message
Hproto: oracles i (s' i) msg
‚Üî message_selectors i msg
    {|
      l := li;
      input := im;
      destination := s' i;
      output := om
    |} ‚à® oracles i (s i) msg
Hsj: ‚àÄ j : index, s j = s' j ‚à® j = i
Hbefore: oracles i (s i) msg
oracles i (s' i) msg
 by apply Hproto; right.
Qed.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
i: index
m: message
Horacle: oracles i (s i) m
‚àÉ (s_item : state) (item : transition_item),
  input_valid_transition_item X s_item item
  ‚àß in_futures X (destination item) s
    ‚àß projT1 (l item) = i
      ‚àß composite_message_selector m item


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
i: index
m: message
Horacle: oracles i (s i) m
‚àÉ (s_item : state) (item : transition_item),
  input_valid_transition_item X s_item item
  ‚àß in_futures X (destination item) s
    ‚àß projT1 (l item) = i
      ‚àß composite_message_selector m item

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to X is s tr
i: index
m: message
item, itemX: transition_item
pre, suf: list transition_item
Htr_pr: tr = pre ++ [itemX] ++ suf
HitemX_pr: match
  match decide (i = projT1 (l itemX)) with
  | left e =>
      Some
        (eq_rect_r
           (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n))
           (projT2 (l itemX)) e)
  | right _ => None
  end
with
| Some lY =>
    Some
      {|
        l := lY;
        input := input itemX;
        destination := destination itemX i;
        output := output itemX
      |}
| None => None
end = Some item
Hout: message_selectors i m item
Ht: input_valid_transition X 
  (l itemX)
  (finite_trace_last is pre, input itemX)
  (destination itemX, output itemX)
input_valid_transition_item X
  (finite_trace_last is pre) itemX
‚àß in_futures X (destination itemX) s
  ‚àß projT1 (l itemX) = i
    ‚àß composite_message_selector m itemX

‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

i: index
m: message
item, itemX: transition_item
pre, suf: list transition_item
Htr_pr: tr = (pre ++ [itemX]) ++ suf
HitemX_pr: match
  match decide (i = projT1 (l itemX)) with
  | left e =>
      Some
        (eq_rect_r
           (Œª n : index, vlabel (IM n))
           (projT2 (l itemX)) e)
  | right _ => None
  end
with
| Some lY =>
    Some
      {|
        l := lY;
        input := input itemX;
        destination := destination itemX i;
        output := output itemX
      |}
| None => None
end = Some item

  (destination itemX, output itemX)

  (finite_trace_last is pre) itemX
‚àß in_futures X (destination itemX) s

    ‚àß composite_message_selector m itemX

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s, is: composite_state IM
itemX: transition_item
pre, suf: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to X is s
  ((pre ++ [itemX]) ++ suf)
m: message
Hout: message_selectors (projT1 (l itemX)) m
  {|
    l := projT2 (l itemX);
    input := input itemX;
    destination :=
      destination itemX (projT1 (l itemX));
    output := output itemX
  |}
Ht: input_valid_transition X 
  (l itemX)
  (finite_trace_last is pre, input itemX)
  (destination itemX, output itemX)
input_valid_transition_item X
  (finite_trace_last is pre) itemX
‚àß in_futures X (destination itemX) s
  ‚àß projT1 (l itemX) = projT1 (l itemX)
    ‚àß composite_message_selector m itemX

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s, is: composite_state IM
itemX: transition_item
pre, suf: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_from_to X
  (finite_trace_last is (pre ++ [itemX])) s suf
m: message
Hout: message_selectors (projT1 (l itemX)) m
  {|
    l := projT2 (l itemX);
    input := input itemX;
    destination :=
      destination itemX (projT1 (l itemX));
    output := output itemX
  |}
Ht: input_valid_transition X 
  (l itemX)
  (finite_trace_last is pre, input itemX)
  (destination itemX, output itemX)
input_valid_transition_item X
  (finite_trace_last is pre) itemX
‚àß in_futures X (destination itemX) s
  ‚àß projT1 (l itemX) = projT1 (l itemX)
    ‚àß composite_message_selector m itemX

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s, is: composite_state IM
itemX: transition_item
pre, suf: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_from_to X 
  (destination itemX) s suf
m: message
Hout: message_selectors (projT1 (l itemX)) m
  {|
    l := projT2 (l itemX);
    input := input itemX;
    destination :=
      destination itemX (projT1 (l itemX));
    output := output itemX
  |}
Ht: input_valid_transition X 
  (l itemX)
  (finite_trace_last is pre, input itemX)
  (destination itemX, output itemX)
input_valid_transition_item X
  (finite_trace_last is pre) itemX
‚àß in_futures X (destination itemX) s
  ‚àß projT1 (l itemX) = projT1 (l itemX)
    ‚àß composite_message_selector m itemX

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
message_selectors: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i) ‚Üí Prop
oracles: ‚àÄ i : index, state_message_oracle (IM i)
stepwise_props: ‚àÄ i : index,
  oracle_stepwise_props
    (message_selectors i) 
    (oracles i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s, is: composite_state IM
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
input: option message
destination: composite_state IM
output: option message
pre, suf: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_from_to X destination s suf
m: message
Hout: message_selectors x m
  {|
    l := v;
    input := input;
    destination := destination x;
    output := output
  |}
Ht: input_valid_transition X 
  (existT x v) (finite_trace_last is pre, input)
  (destination, output)
input_valid_transition_item X
  (finite_trace_last is pre)
  {|
    l := existT x v;
    input := input;
    destination := destination;
    output := output
  |}
‚àß in_futures X destination s
  ‚àß x = x
    ‚àß message_selectors x m
        {|
          l := v;
          input := input;
          destination := destination x;
          output := output
        |}

  by split_and!; [|exists suf|..].
Qed.

End StepwiseProps.
A message has_been_sent for a composite state if it has_been_sent for any of its components. 
Definition composite_has_been_sent
  (s : composite_state IM)
  (m : message)
  : Prop
  := exists (i : index), has_been_sent (IM i) (s i) m.
composite_has_been_sent is decidable. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
RelDecision composite_has_been_sent


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
RelDecision composite_has_been_sent

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
s: composite_state IM
m: message
Decision (composite_has_been_sent s m)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
s: composite_state IM
m: message
Exists (Œª i : index, has_been_sent (IM i) (s i) m)
  (enum index) ‚Üî composite_has_been_sent s m
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
s: composite_state IM
m: message
Decision
  (Exists (Œª i : index, has_been_sent (IM i) (s i) m)
     (enum index))

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
s: composite_state IM
m: message
Exists (Œª i : index, has_been_sent (IM i) (s i) m)
  (enum index) ‚Üî composite_has_been_sent s m
 by rewrite Exists_finite.
  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
s: composite_state IM
m: message
Decision
  (Exists (Œª i : index, has_been_sent (IM i) (s i) m)
     (enum index))
 typeclasses eauto.
Qed.

  ‚Üí Prop

has_been_sent_stepwise_props composite_has_been_sent

  composite_has_been_sent

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
Hinits: ‚àÄ s : vstate (composite_vlsm IM ?constraint),
  initial_state_prop s
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ m : message, ¬¨ composite_oracle s m
Hstep: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (im : option message) 
  (s' : state) (om : option message),
  input_valid_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (composite_vlsm IM ?constraint)) l
    (s, im) (s', om)
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ msg : message,
      composite_oracle s' msg
      ‚Üî composite_message_selector msg
          {|
            l := l;
            input := im;
            destination := s';
            output := om
          |} ‚à® composite_oracle s msg
oracle_stepwise_props (field_selector output)
  composite_has_been_sent

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
Hinits: ‚àÄ s : vstate (composite_vlsm IM constraint),
  initial_state_prop s
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ m : message, ¬¨ composite_oracle s m
Hstep: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (im : option message) 
  (s' : state) (om : option message),
  input_valid_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (composite_vlsm IM constraint)) l
    (s, im) (s', om)
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ msg : message,
      composite_oracle s' msg
      ‚Üî composite_message_selector msg
          {|
            l := l;
            input := im;
            destination := s';
            output := om
          |} ‚à® composite_oracle s msg
‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) (im : option message) (s' : state) 
  (om : option message),
  input_valid_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s, im)
    (s', om)
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ msg : message,
      composite_has_been_sent s' msg
      ‚Üî field_selector output msg
          {|
            l := l;
            input := im;
            destination := s';
            output := om
          |} ‚à® composite_has_been_sent s msg

  by intros l; specialize (Hstep l); destruct l.
Qed.

#[export] Instance composite_HasBeenSentCapability
  (constraint : composite_label IM -> composite_state IM * option message -> Prop)
  (X := composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  : HasBeenSentCapability X :=
  HasBeenSentCapability_from_stepwise (vlsm := X)
    composite_has_been_sent_dec
    (composite_has_been_sent_stepwise_props constraint).


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
s: state
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM)) s
m: message
has_been_sent_prop (free_composite_vlsm IM)
  composite_has_been_sent s m


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
s: state
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM)) s
m: message
has_been_sent_prop (free_composite_vlsm IM)
  composite_has_been_sent s m

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
s: state
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM)) s
m: message
Hproper_sent: ‚àÄ s : state,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (free_composite_vlsm IM)) s
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ m : message,
      has_been_sent_prop
        (free_composite_vlsm IM)
        (has_been_sent
           (free_composite_vlsm IM)) s
        m
has_been_sent_prop (free_composite_vlsm IM)
  composite_has_been_sent s m

  by apply Hproper_sent.
Qed.

Section composite_has_been_received.
A message has_been_received for a composite state if it has_been_received for any of its components. 
Definition composite_has_been_received
  (s : composite_state IM)
  (m : message)
  : Prop
  := exists (i : index), has_been_received (IM i) (s i) m.
composite_has_been_received is decidable. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)

  ‚Üí Prop

  initial_state_prop s
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ m : message, ¬¨ composite_oracle s m
Hstep: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (im : option message) 
  (s' : state) (om : option message),
  input_valid_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (composite_vlsm IM constraint)) l

            input := im;
            destination := s';
            output := om

    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s, im)
    (s', om)
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ msg : message,
      composite_has_been_received s' msg
      ‚Üî field_selector input msg
          {|
            l := l;
            input := im;
            destination := s';
            output := om
          |} ‚à® composite_has_been_received s msg

  by intros l; specialize (Hstep l); destruct l.
Qed.

#[export] Instance composite_HasBeenReceivedCapability
  (constraint : composite_label IM -> composite_state IM * option message -> Prop)
  (X := composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  : HasBeenReceivedCapability X :=
  HasBeenReceivedCapability_from_stepwise (vlsm := X)
    composite_has_been_received_dec
    (composite_has_been_received_stepwise_props constraint).

#[export] Instance composite_HasBeenDirectlyObservedCapability
  (constraint : composite_label IM -> composite_state IM * option message -> Prop)
  (X := composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  : HasBeenDirectlyObservedCapability X :=
  HasBeenDirectlyObservedCapability_from_sent_received X.

‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

  composite_has_been_received

  (im : option message) 
  (s' : state) (om : option message),
  input_valid_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (composite_vlsm IM ?constraint)) l
    (s, im) (s', om)
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ msg : message,
      composite_oracle s' msg
      ‚Üî composite_message_selector msg
          {|
            l := l;
            input := im;
            destination := s';
            output := om
          |} ‚à® composite_oracle s msg
oracle_stepwise_props (field_selector input)
  composite_has_been_received

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
seed: message ‚Üí Prop
X:= pre_loaded_vlsm (composite_vlsm IM constraint) seed: VLSM message
Hinits: ‚àÄ s : vstate (composite_vlsm IM ?constraint),
  initial_state_prop s
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ m : message, ¬¨ composite_oracle s m
Hstep: ‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) 
  (im : option message) 
  (s' : state) (om : option message),
  input_valid_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (composite_vlsm IM ?constraint)) l
    (s, im) (s', om)
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ msg : message,
      composite_oracle s' msg
      ‚Üî composite_message_selector msg
          {|
            l := l;
            input := im;
            destination := s';
            output := om
          |} ‚à® composite_oracle s msg
‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) (im : option message) (s' : state) 
  (om : option message),
  input_valid_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s, im)
    (s', om)
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ msg : message,
      composite_has_been_received s' msg
      ‚Üî field_selector input msg
          {|
            l := l;
            input := im;
            destination := s';
            output := om
          |} ‚à® composite_has_been_received s msg

  by intros l; specialize (Hstep l); destruct l.
Qed.

Definition preloaded_composite_HasBeenReceivedCapability
  (constraint : composite_label IM -> composite_state IM * option message -> Prop)
  (seed : message -> Prop)
  (X := pre_loaded_vlsm (composite_vlsm IM constraint) seed)
  : HasBeenReceivedCapability X :=
  HasBeenReceivedCapability_from_stepwise (vlsm := X)
    composite_has_been_received_dec
    (preloaded_composite_has_been_received_stepwise_props constraint seed).

End composite_has_been_received.
A message has_been_directly_observed in a composite state if it has_been_directly_observed in any of its components. 
Definition composite_has_been_directly_observed
  (s : composite_state IM)
  (m : message)
  : Prop
  := exists (i : index), has_been_directly_observed (IM i) (s i) m.
composite_has_been_directly_observed is decidable. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
RelDecision composite_has_been_directly_observed


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
RelDecision composite_has_been_directly_observed

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
s: composite_state IM
m: message
Decision (composite_has_been_directly_observed s m)

     has_been_directly_observed (IM i) (s i) m)
  (enum index)

Qed.

  ‚Üí Prop

          {|

            destination := s';
            output := om

‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) (im : option message) (s' : state) 
  (om : option message),
  input_valid_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s, im)
    (s', om)
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ msg : message,
      composite_has_been_directly_observed s' msg
      ‚Üî item_sends_or_receives msg
          {|

            input := im;
            destination := s';
            output := om

message, index: Type

  composite_has_been_directly_observed
 apply (composite_has_been_directly_observed_stepwise_props constraint).
Defined.

Context
      {validator : Type}
      (A : validator -> index)
      (sender : message -> option validator)
      .

Definition node_signed_message (node_idx : index) (m : message) : Prop :=
  option_map A (sender m) = Some node_idx.
Definitions for safety and nontriviality of the sender function. Safety means that if we designate a validator as the sender of a certain message, then it is impossible for other components to produce that message
Weak/strong nontriviality say that each validator should be designated sender for at least one/all its valid messages. 
Definition sender_safety_prop : Prop :=
  forall
  (m : message)
  (v : validator)
  (Hsender : sender m = Some v),
  forall (j : index)
         (Hdif : j <> A v),
         ~can_emit (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j)) m.
An alternative, possibly friendlier, formulation. Note that it is slightly weaker, in that it does not require that the sender is able to send the message. 
Definition sender_safety_alt_prop : Prop :=
  forall
  (m : message)
  (v : validator)
  (Hsender : sender m = Some v),
  forall (i : index),
  can_emit (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) m ->
  A v = i.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
sender_safety_prop ‚Üî sender_safety_alt_prop


message, index: Type

sender: message ‚Üí option validator
sender_safety_prop ‚Üî sender_safety_alt_prop

m: message

Hsender: sender m = Some v
i: index
H2: can_emit
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) m
A v = i

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) m
n: i ‚â† A v
A v = i

    by elim (Hsender_safety _ n).

message, index: Type

j: index

Hemit: can_emit
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j)) m
j = A v

    by specialize (Hsender_safety m v Hsender _ Hemit).
Qed.

Definition channel_authenticated_message (node_idx : index) (m : message) : Prop :=
  option_map A (sender m) = Some node_idx.
The channel_authentication_property requires that any sent message must be originating with its sender. Note that we don't require that sender is total, but rather that it is defined for all messages which can be emitted. 
Definition channel_authentication_prop : Prop :=
  forall i m,
  can_emit (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) m ->
  channel_authenticated_message i m.
Channel authentication guarantees sender safety 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index

H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
channel_authentication_prop ‚Üí sender_safety_alt_prop

channel_authentication_prop ‚Üí sender_safety_alt_prop

message, index: Type

H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
Hsigned: channel_authentication_prop
m: message
v: validator
Hsender: sender m = Some v
i: index
Hemit: can_emit
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) m
option_map A (sender m) = Some i

  by apply Hsigned.
Qed.

Definition sender_nontriviality_prop : Prop :=
  forall (v : validator),
  exists (m : message),
  can_emit (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (A v))) m /\
  sender m = Some v.

Definition no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop : Prop :=
  forall i m, ~vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
‚àÄ m : message,
  valid_message_prop X m
  ‚Üí ‚àÉ v : validator,
      sender m = Some v
      ‚àß can_emit
          (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
             (IM (A v))) m

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
m: message
s: state
om: option message
i: index
l: vlabel (IM i)
s': state
Ht: input_valid_transition X 
  (existT i l) (s, om) 
  (s', Some m)
‚àÉ v : validator,
  sender m = Some v
  ‚àß can_emit
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (A v))) m

  {|
    vtype := vtype (composite_vlsm IM constraint);
    vmachine :=
      machine
        (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
           (free_composite_vlsm IM))
  |} (existT i l) (s, om) 
  (s', Some m)
‚àÉ v : validator,
  sender m = Some v
  ‚àß can_emit
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (A v))) m

Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message

validator: Type

m: message

  Some v = Some v0

      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (A v0)))

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
m: message
i: index
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: state
om: option message
l: vlabel (IM i)
s': state
Ht: input_valid_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) l
  (s i, om) (s' i, Some m)
v: validator
Hsender: sender m = Some v
can_emit_signed: A v = i
‚àÉ v0 : validator,
  Some v = Some v0
  ‚àß can_emit
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (A v0)))
      m

  exists v; subst; unfold can_emit; eauto.
Qed.

   sender m = Some v
   ‚àß can_emit
       (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (A v)))
       m) ‚Üí sender m ‚â† None
 intros (v & -> & _); congruence.
  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
m: message
Hm: valid_message_prop X m
‚àÉ v : validator,
  sender m = Some v
  ‚àß can_emit
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (A v))) m
 by eapply composite_no_initial_valid_messages_emitted_by_sender.
Qed.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop
A_inj: ‚àÄ v1 v2 : validator, A v1 = A v2 ‚Üí v1 = v2
‚àÄ (s : state) (item : transition_item),
  input_valid_transition_item
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (free_composite_vlsm IM)) s item
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ v : validator,
      A v = projT1 (l item)
      ‚Üí ‚àÄ m : message,
          output item = Some m ‚Üí sender m = Some v

      A v = projT1 (l item)

          output item = Some m ‚Üí sender m = Some v

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop
A_inj: ‚àÄ v1 v2 : validator, A v1 = A v2 ‚Üí v1 = v2
s: state
item: transition_item
Ht: input_valid_transition_item
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM)) s item
v: validator
HAv: A v = projT1 (l item)
m: message
Houtput: output item = Some m
sender m = Some v

message, index: Type

IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop
A_inj: ‚àÄ v1 v2 : validator, A v1 = A v2 ‚Üí v1 = v2
s: state
item: transition_item
Ht: input_valid_transition_item
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM)) s item
v: validator
HAv: A v = projT1 (l item)
m: message
Houtput: output item = Some m
v': validator
option_map A (Some v') = Some (A v) ‚Üí Some v' = Some v

    by cbn; intros Hvv'; apply Some_inj, A_inj in Hvv'; subst.
  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index

IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator

A_inj: ‚àÄ v1 v2 : validator, A v1 = A v2 ‚Üí v1 = v2
s: state
item: transition_item
Ht: input_valid_transition_item
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM)) s item
v: validator
HAv: A v = projT1 (l item)
m: message
Houtput: output item = Some m
channel_authenticated_message (A v) m

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator

A_inj: ‚àÄ v1 v2 : validator, A v1 = A v2 ‚Üí v1 = v2
s: state
item: transition_item
Ht: input_valid_transition_item
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM)) s item
v: validator
HAv: A v = projT1 (l item)
m: message
Houtput: output item = Some m
Hti: input_valid_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 (l item)))) 
  (projT2 (l item))
  (s (projT1 (l item)), input item)
  (destination item (projT1 (l item)),
  output item)
channel_authenticated_message (A v) m

  by rewrite Houtput in Hti; apply can_emit_signed; rewrite HAv; eexists _, _, _.
Qed.

  (no_additional_equivocations_constraint Free)

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type

sender: message ‚Üí option validator
l: vlabel Free
s: state

Decision
  (no_additional_equivocations_constraint Free l
     (s, om))

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
l: vlabel Free
s: state
m: message
Decision
  (no_additional_equivocations_constraint Free l
     (s, Some m))

  apply no_additional_equivocations_dec.
Qed.
We say that a validator <v> (with associated component <i>) is equivocating wrt. to another component <j>, if there exists a message which has_been_received by <j> but has_not_been_sent by <i> 
Definition equivocating_wrt
  (v : validator)
  (j : index)
  (sv sj : state)
  (i := A v)
  : Prop
  :=
  exists (m : message),
  sender(m) = Some v /\
  has_not_been_sent  (IM i) sv m /\
  has_been_received  (IM j) sj m.
We can now decide whether a validator is equivocating in a certain state. 
Definition is_equivocating_statewise
  (s : composite_state IM)
  (v : validator)
  : Prop
  :=
  exists (j : index),
  equivocating_wrt v j (s (A v)) (s j).


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
s: composite_state IM
Hs: composite_initial_state_prop IM s
v: validator
¬¨ is_equivocating_statewise s v


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
s: composite_state IM
Hs: composite_initial_state_prop IM s
v: validator
¬¨ is_equivocating_statewise s v

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
s: composite_state IM
Hs: composite_initial_state_prop IM s
v: validator
¬¨ (‚àÉ (j : index) (m : message),
     sender m = Some v
     ‚àß has_not_been_sent (IM (A v)) (s (A v)) m
       ‚àß has_been_received (IM j) (s j) m)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type

sender: message ‚Üí option validator
s: composite_state IM
Hs: composite_initial_state_prop IM s
v: validator
j: index
m: message
Hsender: sender m = Some v
Hnbs: has_not_been_sent (IM (A v)) (s (A v)) m
Hrcv: has_been_received (IM j) (s j) m
False

  
message, index: Type

H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type

sender: message ‚Üí option validator
s: composite_state IM
Hs: composite_initial_state_prop IM s
v: validator
j: index
m: message
Hsender: sender m = Some v
Hnbs: has_not_been_sent (IM (A v)) (s (A v)) m
has_been_received (IM j) (s j) m ‚Üí False

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
s: composite_state IM
Hs: composite_initial_state_prop IM s
v: validator
j: index
m: message
Hsender: sender m = Some v
Hnbs: has_not_been_sent (IM (A v)) (s (A v)) m
initial_state_prop (s j)

  apply Hs.
Qed.

Context
    `{finite.Finite validator}
    {measurable_V : Measurable validator}
    {threshold_V : ReachableThreshold validator}
    `{FinSet validator Cm}
    .
For the equivocation sum fault to be computable, we require that our is_equivocating property is decidable. The current implementation refers to is_equivocating_statewise, but this might change in the future. 
Definition equivocation_dec_statewise
   (Hdec : RelDecision is_equivocating_statewise)
    : BasicEquivocation (composite_state IM) validator Cm
  :=
  {|
    state_validators := fun _ => list_to_set (enum validator);
    is_equivocating := is_equivocating_statewise;
    is_equivocating_dec := Hdec
  |}.

Definition equivocation_fault_constraint
  (Dec : BasicEquivocation (composite_state IM) validator Cm)
  (l : composite_label IM)
  (som : composite_state IM * option message)
  : Prop
  :=
  let (s', om') := (composite_transition IM l som) in
  not_heavy s'.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
EqDecision1: EqDecision validator
H2: finite.Finite validator
measurable_V: Measurable validator
threshold_V: ReachableThreshold validator
Cm: Type
H3: ElemOf validator Cm
H4: Empty Cm
H5: Singleton validator Cm
H6: Union Cm
H7: Intersection Cm
H8: Difference Cm
H9: Elements validator Cm
EqDecision2: EqDecision validator
H10: FinSet validator Cm
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
i: index
m: message
Horacle: has_been_sent (IM i) (s i) m
‚àÉ (s_item : state) (item : transition_item),
  input_valid_transition_item X s_item item
  ‚àß in_futures X (destination item) s
    ‚àß projT1 (l item) = i ‚àß output item = Some m


message, index: Type

H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator

H2: finite.Finite validator

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
i: index
m: message
Horacle: has_been_sent (IM i) (s i) m
‚àÉ (s_item : state) (item : transition_item),
  input_valid_transition_item X s_item item
  ‚àß in_futures X (destination item) s
    ‚àß projT1 (l item) = i ‚àß output item = Some m

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
i: index
m: message
Horacle: has_been_sent (IM i) (s i) m
s_item: state
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
input: option message
destination: state
output: option message
Ht: input_valid_transition_item
  (composite_vlsm IM constraint) s_item
  {|
    l := existT x v;
    input := input;
    destination := destination;
    output := output
  |}
Hfutures: in_futures (composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  (VLSM.destination
     {|
       l := existT x v;
       input := input;
       destination := destination;
       output := output
     |}) s
Hi: projT1
  (l
     {|
       l := existT x v;
       input := input;
       destination := destination;
       output := output
     |}) = i
Hselected: composite_message_selector m
  {|
    l := existT x v;
    input := input;
    destination := destination;
    output := output
  |}
‚àÉ (s_item : state) (item : transition_item),
  input_valid_transition_item X s_item item
  ‚àß in_futures X (VLSM.destination item) s
    ‚àß projT1 (l item) = i ‚àß VLSM.output item = Some m

  by eexists _, _.
Qed.

H8: Difference Cm

H10: FinSet validator Cm

i: index
m: message

  input_valid_transition_item X s_item item
  ‚àß in_futures X (destination item) s
    ‚àß projT1 (l item) = i ‚àß input item = Some m

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
i: index
m: message
Horacle: has_been_received (IM i) (s i) m
s_item: state
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
input: option message
destination: state
output: option message
Ht: input_valid_transition_item
  (composite_vlsm IM constraint) s_item
  {|
    l := existT x v;
    input := input;
    destination := destination;
    output := output
  |}
Hfutures: in_futures (composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  (VLSM.destination
     {|
       l := existT x v;
       input := input;
       destination := destination;
       output := output
     |}) s
Hi: projT1
  (l
     {|
       l := existT x v;
       input := input;
       destination := destination;
       output := output
     |}) = i
Hselected: composite_message_selector m
  {|
    l := existT x v;
    input := input;
    destination := destination;
    output := output
  |}
‚àÉ (s_item : state) (item : transition_item),
  input_valid_transition_item X s_item item
  ‚àß in_futures X (VLSM.destination item) s
    ‚àß projT1 (l item) = i ‚àß VLSM.input item = Some m

  by eexists _, _.
Qed.

      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
      (s_m i) m

  destination s

  {|
    vtype := composite_type IM;
    vmachine :=
      machine
        (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
           (free_composite_vlsm IM))
  |} (existT i li) (s_item, input)
  (destination, Some m)

           (free_composite_vlsm IM))
  |} (existT i li) (s_item, input)
  (destination, Some m)
composite_project_label IM i (existT i li) =
Some ?Goal0

  apply (composite_project_label_eq IM).
Qed.

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
EqDecision1: EqDecision validator
H2: finite.Finite validator
measurable_V: Measurable validator
threshold_V: ReachableThreshold validator
Cm: Type
H3: ElemOf validator Cm
H4: Empty Cm
H5: Singleton validator Cm
H6: Union Cm
H7: Intersection Cm
H8: Difference Cm
H9: Elements validator Cm
EqDecision2: EqDecision validator
H10: FinSet validator Cm
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
i: index
m: message
Hsent: has_been_sent (IM i) (s i) m
valid_message_prop X m

  by apply (sent_valid X s); [| exists i].
Qed.

  by eapply sent_valid; [| exists i].
Qed.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
EqDecision1: EqDecision validator
H2: finite.Finite validator
measurable_V: Measurable validator
threshold_V: ReachableThreshold validator
Cm: Type
H3: ElemOf validator Cm
H4: Empty Cm
H5: Singleton validator Cm
H6: Union Cm
H7: Intersection Cm
H8: Difference Cm
H9: Elements validator Cm
EqDecision2: EqDecision validator
H10: FinSet validator Cm
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
i: index
m: message
Hreceived: has_been_received (IM i) (s i) m
valid_message_prop X m


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
EqDecision1: EqDecision validator
H2: finite.Finite validator
measurable_V: Measurable validator
threshold_V: ReachableThreshold validator
Cm: Type
H3: ElemOf validator Cm
H4: Empty Cm
H5: Singleton validator Cm
H6: Union Cm
H7: Intersection Cm
H8: Difference Cm
H9: Elements validator Cm
EqDecision2: EqDecision validator
H10: FinSet validator Cm
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
i: index
m: message
Hreceived: has_been_received (IM i) (s i) m
valid_message_prop X m

  by eapply received_valid; [| exists i].
Qed.

valid_message_prop X m

  by apply messages_sent_from_component_of_valid_state_are_valid with s i.
Qed.

‚à® has_been_sent (IM i) (s i) m
valid_message_prop X m
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
EqDecision1: EqDecision validator
H2: finite.Finite validator
measurable_V: Measurable validator
threshold_V: ReachableThreshold validator
Cm: Type
H3: ElemOf validator Cm
H4: Empty Cm
H5: Singleton validator Cm
H6: Union Cm
H7: Intersection Cm
H8: Difference Cm
H9: Elements validator Cm
EqDecision2: EqDecision validator
H10: FinSet validator Cm
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
m: message
i: index
Hobserved: has_been_directly_observed (IM i) (s i) m
H11: ‚àÄ s : state,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) s
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ m : message,
      has_been_directly_observed (IM i) s m
      ‚Üí has_been_received (IM i) s m
        ‚à® has_been_sent (IM i) s m
valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) 
  (s i)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
EqDecision1: EqDecision validator
H2: finite.Finite validator
measurable_V: Measurable validator
threshold_V: ReachableThreshold validator
Cm: Type
H3: ElemOf validator Cm
H4: Empty Cm
H5: Singleton validator Cm
H6: Union Cm
H7: Intersection Cm
H8: Difference Cm
H9: Elements validator Cm
EqDecision2: EqDecision validator
H10: FinSet validator Cm
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
m: message
i: index
Hobserved: has_been_received (IM i) (s i) m
‚à® has_been_sent (IM i) (s i) m
valid_message_prop X m
 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator

measurable_V: Measurable validator

H8: Difference Cm
H9: Elements validator Cm

H10: FinSet validator Cm

message, index: Type

i: index

valid_message_prop X m
 by eapply messages_received_from_component_of_valid_state_are_valid.

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type
A: validator ‚Üí index
sender: message ‚Üí option validator
EqDecision1: EqDecision validator
H2: finite.Finite validator
measurable_V: Measurable validator
threshold_V: ReachableThreshold validator

H3: ElemOf validator Cm
H4: Empty Cm
H5: Singleton validator Cm
H6: Union Cm
H7: Intersection Cm
H8: Difference Cm
H9: Elements validator Cm
EqDecision2: EqDecision validator
H10: FinSet validator Cm
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
m: message
i: index
Hobserved: has_been_directly_observed (IM i) (s i) m
H11: ‚àÄ s : state,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) s
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ m : message,
      has_been_directly_observed (IM i) s m
      ‚Üí has_been_received (IM i) s m
        ‚à® has_been_sent (IM i) s m
valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)
 by eapply valid_state_project_preloaded.
Qed.


message, index: Type

IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

H10: FinSet validator Cm

  ‚Üí Prop
seed: message ‚Üí Prop
X:= pre_loaded_vlsm (composite_vlsm IM constraint) seed: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
m: message
Hobserved: composite_has_been_directly_observed s m
valid_message_prop X m

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index

H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
validator: Type

    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) s
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ m : message,
      has_been_directly_observed (IM i) s m
      ‚Üí has_been_received (IM i) s m
        ‚à® has_been_sent (IM i) s m
valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM ?constraint)) s

    
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index

      ‚Üí has_been_received (IM i) s m
        ‚à® has_been_sent (IM i) s m
VLSM_incl_part
  (VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
     (vmachine (composite_vlsm IM constraint)) seed)
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
     (composite_vlsm IM constraint))

    apply pre_loaded_vlsm_incl_pre_loaded_with_all_messages.
Qed.

End Composite.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
s: composite_state IM
m: message
composite_has_been_directly_observed IM s m
‚Üî composite_has_been_sent IM s m
  ‚à® composite_has_been_received IM s m

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
s: composite_state IM
m: message
composite_has_been_directly_observed IM s m
‚Üí composite_has_been_sent IM s m
  ‚à® composite_has_been_received IM s m
 by intros [i [Hs|Hr]]; [left | right]; exists i.
  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
s: composite_state IM
m: message
composite_has_been_sent IM s m
‚à® composite_has_been_received IM s m
‚Üí composite_has_been_directly_observed IM s m
 by intros [[i Hs] | [i Hr]]; exists i; [left | right].
Qed.

  ‚à® composite_has_been_received IM s m

  apply composite_has_been_directly_observed_sent_received_iff.
Qed.
