message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
i: index
s: vstate (IM i)
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) s
m: message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
Hlift_s: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Free)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s)
tr: list transition_item
composite_item, item: transition_item
Hcomposite_item: composite_item =
pre_VLSM_full_projection_transition_item_project
  (type
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
        (IM i)))
  (type
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
        (free_composite_vlsm IM)))
  (lift_to_composite_label IM i)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i)
  item
Hitem: item ‚àà tr
Hx: item_sends_or_receives m composite_item
is: state
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) is
  s tr
Hpre_tr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM))
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i is)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s)
  (VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
     (lift_to_composite_preloaded_vlsm_full_projection
        IM i) tr)
‚àÉ x : transition_item,
  x ‚àà tr ‚àß item_sends_or_receives m x

    
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
i: index
s: vstate (IM i)
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) s
m: message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
Hlift_s: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Free)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s)
tr: list transition_item
composite_item, item: transition_item
Hcomposite_item: composite_item =
pre_VLSM_full_projection_transition_item_project
  (type
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
        (IM i)))
  (type
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
        (free_composite_vlsm IM)))
  (lift_to_composite_label IM i)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i)
  item
Hitem: item ‚àà tr
Hx: item_sends_or_receives m composite_item
is: state
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) is
  s tr
Hpre_tr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM))
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i is)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s)
  (VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
     (lift_to_composite_preloaded_vlsm_full_projection
        IM i) tr)
item ‚àà tr ‚àß item_sends_or_receives m item

     (lift_to_composite_preloaded_vlsm_full_projection
        IM i) tr)

    
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
i: index
s: vstate (IM i)
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) s
m: message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
Hlift_s: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Free)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s)
is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) is
  s tr
item: transition_item
Hitem: item ‚àà tr
Hx: item_sends_or_receives m item
Hpre_tr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM))
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i is)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s)
  (VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
     (lift_to_composite_preloaded_vlsm_full_projection
        IM i) tr)
‚àÉ x : transition_item,
  pre_VLSM_full_projection_transition_item_project
    (type (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)))
    (type
       (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
          (free_composite_vlsm IM)))
    (lift_to_composite_label IM i)
    (lift_to_composite_state' IM i) x =
  lift_to_composite_transition_item' IM i item
  ‚àß In x tr
 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
i: index
s: vstate (IM i)
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) s
m: message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
Hlift_s: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Free)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s)
is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) is
  s tr
item: transition_item
Hitem: item ‚àà tr
Hx: item_sends_or_receives m item
Hpre_tr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM))
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i is)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s)
  (VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
     (lift_to_composite_preloaded_vlsm_full_projection
        IM i) tr)
pre_VLSM_full_projection_transition_item_project
  (type (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)))
  (type
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
        (free_composite_vlsm IM)))
  (lift_to_composite_label IM i)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i) item =
lift_to_composite_transition_item' IM i item
‚àß In item tr

    
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
i: index
s: vstate (IM i)
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) s
m: message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
Hlift_s: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm Free)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s)
is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) is
  s tr
item: transition_item
Hitem: In item tr
Hx: item_sends_or_receives m item
Hpre_tr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM))
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i is)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i s)
  (VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
     (lift_to_composite_preloaded_vlsm_full_projection
        IM i) tr)
pre_VLSM_full_projection_transition_item_project
  (type (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)))
  (type
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
        (free_composite_vlsm IM)))
  (lift_to_composite_label IM i)
  (lift_to_composite_state' IM i) item =
lift_to_composite_transition_item' IM i item
‚àß In item tr

    by destruct item.
Qed.

Section sec_CompositeComputableMessages.

Context
  `{EqDecision message}
  `{finite.Finite index}
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  (indexed_oracle_set : forall i, vstate (IM i) -> set message)
  (indexed_message_selector : forall i, message -> vtransition_item (IM i) -> Prop)
  (Free := free_composite_vlsm IM)
  .

Definition composite_oracle_set (s : composite_state IM) : set message :=
  concat (map (fun i => indexed_oracle_set i (s i)) (enum index)).


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
indexed_oracle_set: ‚àÄ i : index,
  vstate (IM i) ‚Üí set message
indexed_message_selector: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i)
    ‚Üí Prop
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
‚àÄ (s : composite_state IM) (m : message),
  m ‚àà composite_oracle_set s
  ‚Üî (‚àÉ i : index, m ‚àà indexed_oracle_set i (s i))


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
indexed_oracle_set: ‚àÄ i : index,
  vstate (IM i) ‚Üí set message
indexed_message_selector: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i)
    ‚Üí Prop
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
‚àÄ (s : composite_state IM) (m : message),
  m ‚àà composite_oracle_set s
  ‚Üî (‚àÉ i : index, m ‚àà indexed_oracle_set i (s i))

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
indexed_oracle_set: ‚àÄ i : index,
  vstate (IM i) ‚Üí set message
indexed_message_selector: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i)
    ‚Üí Prop
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
m: message
(‚àÉ x : list message,
   (‚àÉ x0 : index,
      indexed_oracle_set x0 (s x0) = x
      ‚àß In x0 (enum index)) ‚àß In m x)
‚Üí ‚àÉ i : index, In m (indexed_oracle_set i (s i))
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
indexed_oracle_set: ‚àÄ i : index,
  vstate (IM i) ‚Üí set message
indexed_message_selector: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i)
    ‚Üí Prop
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
m: message
(‚àÉ i : index, In m (indexed_oracle_set i (s i)))
‚Üí ‚àÉ x : list message,
    (‚àÉ x0 : index,
       indexed_oracle_set x0 (s x0) = x
       ‚àß In x0 (enum index)) ‚àß 
    In m x

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
indexed_oracle_set: ‚àÄ i : index,
  vstate (IM i) ‚Üí set message
indexed_message_selector: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i)
    ‚Üí Prop
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
m: message
(‚àÉ x : list message,
   (‚àÉ x0 : index,
      indexed_oracle_set x0 (s x0) = x
      ‚àß In x0 (enum index)) ‚àß In m x)
‚Üí ‚àÉ i : index, In m (indexed_oracle_set i (s i))
 by intros (? & (? & <- & _) & ?); eexists.
  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
indexed_oracle_set: ‚àÄ i : index,
  vstate (IM i) ‚Üí set message
indexed_message_selector: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i)
    ‚Üí Prop
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: composite_state IM
m: message
(‚àÉ i : index, In m (indexed_oracle_set i (s i)))
‚Üí ‚àÉ x : list message,
    (‚àÉ x0 : index,
       indexed_oracle_set x0 (s x0) = x
       ‚àß In x0 (enum index)) ‚àß In m x
 by intros []; repeat esplit; [apply elem_of_list_In, elem_of_enum |].
Qed.


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
indexed_oracle_set: ‚àÄ i : index,
  vstate (IM i) ‚Üí set message
indexed_message_selector: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i)
    ‚Üí Prop
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
Hcmos: ‚àÄ i : index,
  computable_messages_oracle 
    (IM i) (indexed_oracle_set i)
    (indexed_message_selector i)
computable_messages_oracle Free composite_oracle_set
  (composite_message_selector IM
     (message_selectors:=indexed_message_selector))


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
indexed_oracle_set: ‚àÄ i : index,
  vstate (IM i) ‚Üí set message
indexed_message_selector: ‚àÄ i : index,
  message
  ‚Üí vtransition_item (IM i)
    ‚Üí Prop
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
Hcmos: ‚àÄ i : index,
  computable_messages_oracle 
    (IM i) (indexed_oracle_set i)
    (indexed_message_selector i)
computable_messages_oracle Free composite_oracle_set
  (composite_message_selector IM
     (message_selectors:=indexed_message_selector))

  constructor; intros
  ; setoid_rewrite elem_of_composite_oracle_set
  ; apply composite_stepwise_props
     with (message_selectors := indexed_message_selector)
          (oracles := fun (i : index) (s : vstate (IM i)) (m : message) =>
            m ‚àà indexed_oracle_set i s)
  ; [| done | | done]; intro; apply Hcmos.
Qed.

End sec_CompositeComputableMessages.

Section sec_composite_computable_sent_received_observed.

Context
  `{EqDecision message}
  `{finite.Finite index}
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  `{forall i, ComputableSentMessages (IM i)}
  `{forall i, ComputableReceivedMessages (IM i)}
  .

Definition composite_received_messages_set : composite_state IM -> list message :=
  composite_oracle_set IM (fun i => received_messages_set).

Definition composite_sent_messages_set : composite_state IM -> list message :=
  composite_oracle_set IM (fun i => sent_messages_set).

Definition composite_observed_messages_set (s : composite_state IM) : list message :=
  composite_sent_messages_set s ++ composite_received_messages_set s.


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableSentMessages (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableReceivedMessages (IM i)
‚àÄ (s : composite_state IM) (m : message),
  composite_has_been_received IM s m
  ‚Üî m ‚àà composite_received_messages_set s


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableSentMessages (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableReceivedMessages (IM i)
‚àÄ (s : composite_state IM) (m : message),
  composite_has_been_received IM s m
  ‚Üî m ‚àà composite_received_messages_set s

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableSentMessages (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableReceivedMessages (IM i)
‚àÄ (s : composite_state IM) (m : message),
  composite_has_been_received IM s m
  ‚Üî (‚àÉ i : index, m ‚àà received_messages_set (s i))

  by split; intros [i Hi]; exists i; apply has_been_received_messages_set_iff.
Qed.


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableSentMessages (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableReceivedMessages (IM i)
‚àÄ (s : composite_state IM) (m : message),
  composite_has_been_sent IM s m
  ‚Üî m ‚àà composite_sent_messages_set s


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableSentMessages (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableReceivedMessages (IM i)
‚àÄ (s : composite_state IM) (m : message),
  composite_has_been_sent IM s m
  ‚Üî m ‚àà composite_sent_messages_set s

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableSentMessages (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableReceivedMessages (IM i)
‚àÄ (s : composite_state IM) (m : message),
  composite_has_been_sent IM s m
  ‚Üî (‚àÉ i : index, m ‚àà sent_messages_set (s i))

  by split; intros [i Hi]; exists i; apply elem_of_sent_messages_set.
Qed.


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableSentMessages (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableReceivedMessages (IM i)
‚àÄ (s : composite_state IM) (m : message),
  composite_has_been_directly_observed IM s m
  ‚Üî m ‚àà composite_observed_messages_set s


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableSentMessages (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableReceivedMessages (IM i)
‚àÄ (s : composite_state IM) (m : message),
  composite_has_been_directly_observed IM s m
  ‚Üî m ‚àà composite_observed_messages_set s

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableSentMessages (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableReceivedMessages (IM i)
s: composite_state IM
m: message
composite_has_been_directly_observed IM s m
‚Üî m ‚àà composite_observed_messages_set s

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
index: Type
EqDecision1: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableSentMessages (IM i)
H1: ‚àÄ i : index, ComputableReceivedMessages (IM i)
s: composite_state IM
m: message
composite_has_been_directly_observed IM s m
‚Üî m
  ‚àà composite_sent_messages_set s ++
    composite_received_messages_set s

  by rewrite elem_of_app, composite_has_been_directly_observed_sent_received_iff,
     elem_of_composite_sent_messages_set, elem_of_composite_received_messages_set.
Qed.

End sec_composite_computable_sent_received_observed.

Section cannot_resend_message.

Context
  {message : Type}
  `{EqDecision message}
  (X : VLSM message)
  (PreX := pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  `{HasBeenSentCapability message X}
  `{HasBeenReceivedCapability message X}
  .

Definition state_received_not_sent (s : state) (m : message) : Prop :=
  has_been_received X s m /\ ~ has_been_sent X s m.


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
state_received_not_sent s m
‚Üî trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after tr m


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
state_received_not_sent s m
‚Üî trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after tr m

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
valid_state_prop PreX s
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
Hs: valid_state_prop PreX s
state_received_not_sent s m
‚Üî trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after tr m

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
valid_state_prop PreX s
 by apply proj1, valid_trace_last_pstate in Htr. 
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
Hs: valid_state_prop PreX s
state_received_not_sent s m
‚Üî trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after tr m

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
Hs: valid_state_prop PreX s
Hbrm: has_been_received X s m
Hnbsm: ¬¨ has_been_sent X s m
trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after tr m
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
Hs: valid_state_prop PreX s
Hbrm: trace_has_message (field_selector input) m tr
Hnbsm: ¬¨ trace_has_message (field_selector output) m
    tr
state_received_not_sent s m

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
Hs: valid_state_prop PreX s
Hbrm: has_been_received X s m
Hnbsm: ¬¨ has_been_sent X s m
trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after tr m
 
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
Hs: valid_state_prop PreX s
Hbrm: selected_message_exists_in_all_preloaded_traces
  X (field_selector input) s m
Hnbsm: ¬¨ has_been_sent X s m
trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after tr m

    
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
Hs: valid_state_prop PreX s
Hbrm: trace_has_message (field_selector input) m tr
Hnbsm: ¬¨ has_been_sent X s m
trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after tr m

    
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
Hs: valid_state_prop PreX s
Hbrm: trace_has_message (field_selector input) m tr
Hnbsm: ¬¨ has_been_sent X s m
¬¨ trace_has_message (field_selector output) m tr

    
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
Hs: valid_state_prop PreX s
Hbrm: trace_has_message (field_selector input) m tr
Hnbsm: ¬¨ has_been_sent X s m
Hbsm: trace_has_message (field_selector output) m tr
False
 
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
Hs: valid_state_prop PreX s
Hbrm: trace_has_message (field_selector input) m tr
Hnbsm: ¬¨ has_been_sent X s m
Hbsm: trace_has_message (field_selector output) m tr
has_been_sent X s m

    
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
m: message
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
Hs: valid_state_prop PreX s
Hbrm: trace_has_message (field_selector input) m tr
Hnbsm: ¬¨ has_been_sent X s m
Hbsm: trace_has_message (field_selector output) m tr
selected_message_exists_in_all_preloaded_traces X
  (field_selector output) s m

    by apply has_been_sent_consistency; [..|exists is, tr, Htr].

Hnbsm: ¬¨ trace_has_message (field_selector output) m
    tr
state_received_not_sent s m

trace_has_message (field_selector output) m tr

      by apply proper_sent in Hbsm; [eapply Hbsm|].
Qed.

Definition state_received_not_sent_invariant
  (s : state)
  (P : message -> Prop)
  : Prop
  := forall m, state_received_not_sent s m -> P m.


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
P: message ‚Üí Prop
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
state_received_not_sent_invariant s P
‚Üî trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after_invariant tr
    P


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
P: message ‚Üí Prop
s, is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
state_received_not_sent_invariant s P
‚Üî trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after_invariant tr
    P

  by split; intros Hinv m Hm
  ; apply Hinv
  ; apply (state_received_not_sent_trace_iff m s is tr Htr).
Qed.
A sent message cannot have been previously sent or received. 
Definition cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop : Prop :=
  forall l s oim s' m,
    input_valid_transition (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s,oim) (s',Some m) ->
    ~has_been_sent X s m /\ ~has_been_received X s' m.


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
s1, s2: state
Hfuture: in_futures PreX s1 s2
‚àÄ m : message,
  state_received_not_sent s1 m
  ‚Üí state_received_not_sent s2 m


message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message

H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
s1, s2: state
Hfuture: in_futures PreX s1 s2
‚àÄ m : message,
  state_received_not_sent s1 m
  ‚Üí state_received_not_sent s2 m

Hm: state_received_not_sent s' m
IHHtr2: state_received_not_sent s m
‚Üí state_received_not_sent f m
state_received_not_sent f m

message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X

s': state
iom: option message
l: label
m: message
Ht: input_valid_transition PreX l 
  (s', iom) (s, Some m)
Hs: ¬¨ has_been_sent X s' m
Hrupd: has_been_received X s m
‚Üî iom = Some m ‚à® has_been_received X s' m
Hmupd: has_been_sent X s m
‚Üî Some m = Some m ‚à® has_been_sent X s' m
Hr: has_been_received X s m
False

  by apply Hno_resend in Ht as [_ []].
Qed.

Context
  (Hno_resend : cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop).

    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s0 s'

     [{|

      output := Some m
    |}])
Hs: finite_trace_last is tr = s
Hlst: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s'
selected_message_exists_in_some_preloaded_traces X
  (field_selector input) s' m

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
l: label
s: state
m: message
s', is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) is s'
  (tr ++
   [{|
      l := l;
      input := Some m;
      destination := s';
      output := Some m
    |}])
Hs: finite_trace_last is tr = s
Hlst: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s'
trace_has_message (field_selector input) m
  (tr ++
   [{|
      l := l;
      input := Some m;
      destination := s';
      output := Some m
    |}])

  by apply Exists_app; right; apply Exists_cons; left.
Qed.

H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
P: message ‚Üí Prop
tr: list transition_item
Htrm: trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after_invariant
  tr P
is: state
Htr: finite_valid_trace PreX is tr
finite_valid_trace (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) is tr

message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message

    (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) si tr

oracle_stepwise_props ?Goal1 (has_been_received X)
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
P: message ‚Üí Prop
tr: list transition_item
sf: state
iom: option message
l: label
m: message
x:= {|
  l := l;
  input := iom;
  destination := sf;
  output := Some m
|}: transition_item
si: state
Htr: finite_valid_trace PreX si tr
Hx: input_valid_transition PreX l
  (finite_trace_last si tr, iom) 
  (sf, Some m)
IHHtr: (‚àÄ m : message,
   trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after tr
     m ‚Üí P m)
‚Üí finite_valid_trace_from
    (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) si tr
Hrecv: trace_has_message (field_selector input) m tr
finite_valid_trace_from_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) 
  ?Goal3 (finite_trace_last si tr) 
  ?Goal4

      
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
P: message ‚Üí Prop
tr: list transition_item
sf: state
iom: option message
l: label
m: message
x:= {|
  l := l;
  input := iom;
  destination := sf;
  output := Some m
|}: transition_item
si: state
Htr: finite_valid_trace PreX si tr
Hx: input_valid_transition PreX l
  (finite_trace_last si tr, iom) 
  (sf, Some m)
IHHtr: (‚àÄ m : message,
   trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after tr
     m ‚Üí P m)
‚Üí finite_valid_trace_from
    (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) si tr
Hrecv: trace_has_message (field_selector input) m tr
trace_has_message ?Goal1 m ?Goal4
‚à® has_been_received X ?Goal3 m
 by left.

message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
P: message ‚Üí Prop
tr: list transition_item
sf: state
m: message
oom: option message
l: label
x:= {|
  l := l;
  input := Some m;
  destination := sf;
  output := oom
|}: transition_item
Htrm: ‚àÄ m : message,
  trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after
    (tr ++ [x]) m ‚Üí P m
si: state
Htr: finite_valid_trace PreX si tr
Hx: input_valid_transition PreX l
  (finite_trace_last si tr, Some m) 
  (sf, oom)
IHHtr: finite_valid_trace_from 
  (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) si tr
Htrm': trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after_invariant
  tr P
Hnot_sent: ¬¨ trace_has_message
    (field_selector output) m tr
initial_message_prop m

      
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
P: message ‚Üí Prop
tr: list transition_item
sf: state
m: message
oom: option message
l: label
x:= {|
  l := l;
  input := Some m;
  destination := sf;
  output := oom
|}: transition_item
Htrm: ‚àÄ m : message,
  trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after
    (tr ++ [x]) m ‚Üí P m
si: state
Htr: finite_valid_trace PreX si tr
Hx: input_valid_transition PreX l
  (finite_trace_last si tr, Some m) 
  (sf, oom)
IHHtr: finite_valid_trace_from 
  (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) si tr
Htrm': trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after_invariant
  tr P
Hnot_sent: ¬¨ trace_has_message
    (field_selector output) m tr
P m

message: Type

  destination := sf;
  output := Some m

  tr P

        by rewrite (has_been_received_step_update Hx); left.
Qed.

‚Üí trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after_invariant tr
    P

    by apply state_received_not_sent_invariant_trace_iff with is.

message: Type

  by rewrite <- (valid_trace_get_last Htr).
Qed.

message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message

message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
P: message ‚Üí Prop
s: state
Hequiv_s: state_received_not_sent_invariant s P
m: message
Hgen: can_produce PreX s m
‚àÉ (is : state) (tr : list transition_item) (item : transition_item),
  finite_valid_trace (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) is tr
  ‚àß last_error tr = Some item
    ‚àß destination item = s ‚àß output item = Some m

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
P: message ‚Üí Prop
s: state
Hequiv_s: state_received_not_sent_invariant s P
m: message
Hgen: ‚àÉ (is : state) (tr : list transition_item) 
  (item : transition_item),
  finite_valid_trace PreX is tr
  ‚àß last_error tr = Some item
    ‚àß destination item = s
      ‚àß output item = Some m
‚àÉ (is : state) (tr : list transition_item) (item : transition_item),
  finite_valid_trace (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) is tr
  ‚àß last_error tr = Some item
    ‚àß destination item = s ‚àß output item = Some m

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
P: message ‚Üí Prop
s: state
Hequiv_s: state_received_not_sent_invariant s P
m: message
is: state
tr: list transition_item
item: transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace PreX is tr
Hgen: last_error tr = Some item
‚àß destination item = s ‚àß output item = Some m
‚àÉ (is : state) (tr : list transition_item) (item : transition_item),
  finite_valid_trace (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) is tr
  ‚àß last_error tr = Some item
    ‚àß destination item = s ‚àß output item = Some m

Hgen: last_error tr = Some item
‚àß destination item = s ‚àß output item = Some m
finite_valid_trace (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) is tr
‚àß last_error tr = Some item
  ‚àß destination item = s ‚àß output item = Some m

    finite_valid_trace PreX is tr
    ‚Üí finite_valid_trace 
        (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) is tr

‚àß destination item = s ‚àß output item = Some m

  tr P
‚Üí ‚àÄ is : state,
    finite_valid_trace PreX is tr
    ‚Üí finite_valid_trace 
        (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) is tr
finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
P: message ‚Üí Prop
s: state
m: message
is: state
tr: list transition_item
item: transition_item

‚àß destination item = s ‚àß output item = Some m
Hlift: trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after_invariant
  tr P
‚Üí ‚àÄ is : state,
    finite_valid_trace PreX is tr
    ‚Üí finite_valid_trace 
        (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) is tr
finite_trace_last is tr = s

  
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision message
X: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenSentCapability X
H0: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
Hno_resend: cannot_resend_message_stepwise_prop
P: message ‚Üí Prop
s: state
m: message
is: state
tr: list transition_item
item: transition_item

Hgen: last_error tr = Some item
‚àß destination item = s ‚àß output item = Some m
Hlift: trace_received_not_sent_before_or_after_invariant
  tr P
‚Üí ‚àÄ is : state,
    finite_valid_trace PreX is tr
    ‚Üí finite_valid_trace 
        (pre_loaded_vlsm X P) is tr
option_map destination (last_error tr) = Some s

  by destruct Hgen as [-> [<- _]].
Qed.

End cannot_resend_message.

Section has_been_sent_irrelevance.
Since we have several ways of obtaining the has_been_sent property, we sometimes need to show that they are equivalent. 
Context
  {message : Type}
  (X : VLSM message)
  (Hbs1 : HasBeenSentCapability X)
  (Hbs2 : HasBeenSentCapability X)
  (has_been_sent1 := @has_been_sent _ X Hbs1)
  (has_been_sent2 := @has_been_sent _ X Hbs2)
  .


message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hbs1, Hbs2: HasBeenSentCapability X
has_been_sent1:= has_been_sent X: state_message_oracle X
has_been_sent2:= has_been_sent X: state_message_oracle X
s: state
m: message
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
has_been_sent1 s m ‚Üí has_been_sent2 s m


message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hbs1, Hbs2: HasBeenSentCapability X
has_been_sent1:= has_been_sent X: state_message_oracle X
has_been_sent2:= has_been_sent X: state_message_oracle X
s: state
m: message
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
has_been_sent1 s m ‚Üí has_been_sent2 s m

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hbs1, Hbs2: HasBeenSentCapability X
has_been_sent1:= has_been_sent X: state_message_oracle X
has_been_sent2:= has_been_sent X: state_message_oracle X
s: state
m: message
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
H: has_been_sent1 s m
has_been_sent2 s m

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
Hbs1, Hbs2: HasBeenSentCapability X
has_been_sent1:= has_been_sent X: state_message_oracle X
has_been_sent2:= has_been_sent X: state_message_oracle X
s: state
m: message
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
H: selected_message_exists_in_all_preloaded_traces X
  (field_selector output) s m
has_been_sent2 s m

  by apply proper_sent.
Qed.

End has_been_sent_irrelevance.

Section all_traces_to_valid_state_are_valid.

Context
  {message : Type}
  {index : Type}
  `{finite.Finite index}
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  `{forall i : index, (HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i))}
  (constraint : composite_label IM -> composite_state IM * option message -> Prop)
  (X := composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  (PreX := pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  .
Under HasBeenReceivedCapability assumptions, and given the fact that any valid state s has a valid trace leading to it, in which all (received) messages are valid, it follows that any message which has_been_received for state s is valid.
Hence, given any pre_loaded trace leading to s, all messages received within it must be valid, thus the trace itself is valid. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
s: state
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
finite_valid_trace_init_to X is s tr


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
s: state
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
finite_valid_trace_init_to X is s tr

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
PreX:= pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X: VLSM message
s: state
Hs: valid_state_prop X s
is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace_init_to PreX is s tr
‚àÄ m : message,
  trace_has_message (field_selector input) m tr
  ‚Üí valid_message_prop X m

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)

‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

‚àÄ m : message,

  ‚Üí valid_message_prop X m

H1: trace_has_message (field_selector input) m tr
valid_message_prop X m

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
H0: ‚àÄ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

Hspre: valid_state_prop PreX s
m: message
H1: trace_has_message (field_selector input) m tr
composite_has_been_received IM s m

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

  (has_been_received X) s m

  X (field_selector input) s m
‚Üí has_been_received X s m
composite_has_been_received IM s m
 
message, index: Type

  X (field_selector input) s m
‚Üí has_been_received X s m

  (field_selector input) s m

  
message, index: Type

H: finite.Finite index

  X (field_selector input) s m
‚Üí has_been_received X s m
selected_message_exists_in_some_preloaded_traces X
  (field_selector input) s m

  by exists is, tr, Htr.
Qed.

End all_traces_to_valid_state_are_valid.

Section has_been_received_in_state.

Context
  {message : Type}
  (X : VLSM message)
  `{HasBeenReceivedCapability message X}
.


message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message
valid_state_prop X s1
‚Üí has_been_received X s1 m
  ‚Üí ‚àÉ (s0 : state) (item : transition_item) (tr : 
                                             list
                                               transition_item),
      input item = Some m
      ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to X s0 s1
          (item :: tr)


message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message
valid_state_prop X s1
‚Üí has_been_received X s1 m
  ‚Üí ‚àÉ (s0 : state) (item : transition_item) (tr : 
                                             list
                                               transition_item),
      input item = Some m
      ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to X s0 s1
          (item :: tr)

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message
Hpsp: valid_state_prop X s1
Hhbr: has_been_received X s1 m
‚àÉ (s0 : state) (item : transition_item) (tr : list
                                                transition_item),
  input item = Some m
  ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to X s0 s1 (item :: tr)

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message
Hpsp: valid_state_prop X s1
Hhbr: has_been_received X s1 m
Hetr: ‚àÉ (is : state) (tr : list transition_item),
  finite_valid_trace_init_to X is s1 tr
‚àÉ (s0 : state) (item : transition_item) (tr : list
                                                transition_item),
  input item = Some m
  ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to X s0 s1 (item :: tr)

      ‚Üí selected_message_exists_in_all_preloaded_traces

  s1

       apply Hpsp.

  ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to X s0 s1 (item :: tr)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (field_selector input) s1 m

  ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to X s0 s1 (item :: tr)

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message
Hpsp: valid_state_prop X s1
Hhbr: ‚àÄ (start : state) (tr : list transition_item),
  finite_valid_trace_init_to
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) start
    s1 tr
  ‚Üí trace_has_message (field_selector input) m
      tr
ist: state
tr: list transition_item
Hetr: finite_valid_trace_init_to X ist s1 tr
‚àÉ (s0 : state) (item : transition_item) (tr : list
                                                transition_item),
  input item = Some m
  ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to X s0 s1 (item :: tr)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) ist s1

‚àÉ (s0 : state) (item : transition_item) (tr : list
                                                transition_item),
  input item = Some m
  ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to X s0 s1 (item :: tr)

X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message
Hpsp: valid_state_prop X s1
ist: state
tr: list transition_item
tritem: transition_item
l1, l2: list transition_item
l: label
input: option message
destination: state
output: option message
Heqtritem: tritem =
{|
  l := l;
  input := input;
  destination := destination;
  output := output
|}
Heqtr: tr =
l1 ++
{|
  l := l;
  input := input;
  destination := destination;
  output := output
|} :: l2
Hintritem: VLSM.input
  {|
    l := l;
    input := input;
    destination := destination;
    output := output
  |} = Some m
Htr1: finite_valid_trace_from_to X ist
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) l1
Htr2: finite_valid_trace_from_to X
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) s1
  ({|
     l := l;
     input := input;
     destination := destination;
     output := output
   |} :: l2)

‚àÉ (s0 : state) (item : transition_item) (tr : list
                                                transition_item),
  VLSM.input item = Some m
  ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to X s0 s1 (item :: tr)

  input := Some m;
  destination := destination;
  output := output
|} :: l2

{|
  l := l;
  input := Some m;
  destination := destination;
  output := output

  (finite_trace_last ist l1) l1
Htr2: finite_valid_trace_from_to X
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) s1
  ({|

message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message
Hpsp: valid_state_prop X s1
ist: state
tr: list transition_item
tritem: transition_item
l1, l2: list transition_item
l: label
destination: state
output: option message
Heqtr: tr =
l1 ++
{|
  l := l;
  input := Some m;
  destination := destination;
  output := output
|} :: l2
Heqtritem: tritem =
{|
  l := l;
  input := Some m;
  destination := destination;
  output := output
|}
Htr1: finite_valid_trace_from_to X ist
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) l1
Htr2: finite_valid_trace_from_to X
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) s1
  ({|
     l := l;
     input := Some m;
     destination := destination;
     output := output
   |} :: l2)
Hisp: initial_state_prop ist
input ?item = Some m
‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to X ?s0 s1 (?item :: ?tr)

  by split; [| apply  Htr2].
Qed.


message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message
valid_state_prop (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  s1
‚Üí has_been_received X s1 m
  ‚Üí ‚àÉ (s0 : state) (item : transition_item) (tr : 
                                             list
                                               transition_item),
      input item = Some m
      ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to
          (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s0 s1
          (item :: tr)

          (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s0 s1
          (item :: tr)

message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (field_selector input) s1 m
ist: state
tr: list transition_item
Hetr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) ist s1
  tr
‚àÉ (s0 : state) (item : transition_item) (tr : list
                                                transition_item),
  input item = Some m
  ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s0 s1
      (item :: tr)

  
message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message
Hpsp: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hhbr: ‚àÄ (start : state) (tr : list transition_item),
  finite_valid_trace_init_to
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) start
    s1 tr
  ‚Üí trace_has_message (field_selector input) m
      tr
ist: state
tr: list transition_item
Hetr: finite_valid_trace_init_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) ist s1
  tr
‚àÉ (s0 : state) (item : transition_item) (tr : list
                                                transition_item),
  input item = Some m
  ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s0 s1
      (item :: tr)

Hintritem: input tritem = Some m
Hfptf: finite_valid_trace_from_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) ist
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) l1
‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
    (finite_trace_last ist l1) s1
    (tritem :: l2)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
ist: state
tr: list transition_item
tritem: transition_item
l1, l2: list transition_item
Heqtr: tr = l1 ++ tritem :: l2
Hintritem: input tritem = Some m
Htr1: finite_valid_trace_from_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) ist
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) l1
Htr2: finite_valid_trace_from_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) s1 
  (tritem :: l2)

‚àÉ (s0 : state) (item : transition_item) (tr : list
                                                transition_item),

message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message
Hpsp: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
ist: state
tr: list transition_item
tritem: transition_item
l1, l2: list transition_item
l: label
input: option message
destination: state
output: option message
Heqtritem: tritem =
{|
  l := l;
  input := input;
  destination := destination;
  output := output
|}
Heqtr: tr =
l1 ++
{|
  l := l;
  input := input;
  destination := destination;
  output := output
|} :: l2
Hintritem: VLSM.input
  {|
    l := l;
    input := input;
    destination := destination;
    output := output
  |} = Some m
Htr1: finite_valid_trace_from_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) ist
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) l1
Htr2: finite_valid_trace_from_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) s1
  ({|
     l := l;
     input := input;
     destination := destination;
     output := output
   |} :: l2)
Hisp: initial_state_prop ist
‚àÉ (s0 : state) (item : transition_item) (tr : list
                                                transition_item),
  VLSM.input item = Some m
  ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s0 s1
      (item :: tr)

message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message
Hpsp: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
ist: state
tr: list transition_item
tritem: transition_item
l1, l2: list transition_item
l: label
destination: state
output: option message
Heqtr: tr =
l1 ++
{|
  l := l;
  input := Some m;
  destination := destination;
  output := output
|} :: l2
Heqtritem: tritem =
{|
  l := l;
  input := Some m;
  destination := destination;
  output := output
|}
Htr1: finite_valid_trace_from_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) ist
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) l1
Htr2: finite_valid_trace_from_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) s1
  ({|
     l := l;
     input := Some m;
     destination := destination;
     output := output
   |} :: l2)
Hisp: initial_state_prop ist
‚àÉ tr0 : list transition_item,
  input ?item = Some m
  ‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to
      (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) ?s0 s1
      (?item :: tr0)
 
message: Type
X: VLSM message
H: HasBeenReceivedCapability X
s1: state
m: message
Hpsp: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
ist: state
tr: list transition_item
tritem: transition_item
l1, l2: list transition_item
l: label
destination: state
output: option message
Heqtr: tr =
l1 ++
{|
  l := l;
  input := Some m;
  destination := destination;
  output := output
|} :: l2
Heqtritem: tritem =
{|
  l := l;
  input := Some m;
  destination := destination;
  output := output
|}
Htr1: finite_valid_trace_from_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) ist
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) l1
Htr2: finite_valid_trace_from_to
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (finite_trace_last ist l1) s1
  ({|
     l := l;
     input := Some m;
     destination := destination;
     output := output
   |} :: l2)
Hisp: initial_state_prop ist
input ?item = Some m
‚àß finite_valid_trace_from_to
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) ?s0 s1
    (?item :: ?tr)

  by split; [| apply  Htr2].
Qed.

End has_been_received_in_state.
